thread.section_title: www.arguscarhire.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.arguscarhire.com | www.arguscarhire.com
thread.title: Ruth

author: Ruth
title: Ruth
text: DELPASO hire car company put you under very extreme pressure to take out there extra insurance policy even if you have already got your own private policy. They told us that the car was clean of all marks which it wasn't and when we went back in to record the marks they did not want to come out and take a look. So we took pictures on phone of all the marks. Would deffenilty not hire from them again.
